attributes.action: The government needs to introduce a reduction of fees and a grant for students.
attributes.additional_details: Students should also get a discount for this year's fees and last year's due to the teaching being in shambles. The latest NUS survey has shown that nearly 50% of student are facing mental health problems due to the pandemic.The teaching so far for most universities in the UK has 75% been online. Most students agree that they should not pay for university as they do not get to use the campuses and the services/facilities that are available. Some students are watching online recorded workshops. The government needs to step up for students as we are the future workforce.
attributes.background: The government need to offer undergraduates and postgraduates additional funding in the form of grants. Student have been let down since the pandemic started and recently students have been deprived of there education.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions which call for similar actions: 

Reduce University student tuition fees from £9250 to £3000: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550344

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516

Implement support for university students during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554299

Enable all students to end university tenancy agreements early due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553285
